item.title: A woman sues Royal Caribbean over her fiance's death on a cruise ship
item.description: The fiancee of a man who died on a cruise ship has filed a wrongful death lawsuit against Royal Caribbean

item.title: Democrat wins Miami mayor’s race for the first time in nearly 30 years
item.description: Democrat Eileen Higgins has won the Miami mayor’s race over a Republican endorsed by President Donald Trump

item.description: The Supreme Court is taking up an appeal from Alabama, which wants to put to death a man who lower federal courts found is intellectually disabled and...
